Question: This person later explained that there were other, more pragmatic reasons for abandoning his acting career in favor of standup.
Hints: This person unexpectedly stopped performing regularly in 1976, when his career appeared to be at its height.
This person voiced a character in the Disney/Pixar animated feature Cars, which opened on June 9, 2006.
For example, this person often criticized elections as an illusion of choice.
